name: xref2csv
description: Convert XREF bibliography file (in XML) to semicolon delimited CSV for ASreview.

scripts.patch-release: npm run build && npm version patch --force -m "Patch release" && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.minor-release: npm run build && npm version minor --force -m "Minor release" && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.major-release: npm run build && npm version major --force -m "Major release" && npm publish && git push --follow-tags

author: Erik Vullings <erik.vullings@tno.nl>
